entry.name: pagebeforecreate
entry.title: pagebeforecreate
entry.desc: Triggered on the page being initialized, before most plugin auto-initialization occurs.

longdesc.p: Note that by binding to pagebeforecreate, you can manipulate markup before jQuery Mobile's default widgets are auto-initialized. For example, say you want to add data attributes via JavaScript instead of in the HTML source, this is the event you'd use.
